titles.title: Building Technologies Research and Development Act
Building Technologies Research and Development Act
To direct the Secretary of Energy to carry out a research, development, and demonstration program with respect to building technologies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.

bill.summary:
Building Technologies Research and Development Act
This bill requires the Department of Energy to establish a program of research, development, demonstration, and commercial application to develop cost-effective tools, technologies, and practices that reduce emissions from, increase productivity and well-being of occupants in, and increase the energy efficiency and beneficial electrification of new and existing commercial and residential buildings.
